messages.subject: RE: Cute puppies

messages.messageBody:
>>So Karen, have you been to the Rethinking Education conference then?
Going
this year? I've been to the last 3 (or 4?) and will be there this fall at
the cooperative conference. Perhaps we've met? Anyone else here going to
that?<<

No, at the time we weren't unschooling :(, although talking about that with
my good friend Deanna Philbin started me on the way. She and her family
attended one year. Best of luck with the co-op conference; the concept
sounds great and I hope it goes well.

Karen
